text: burning sun FLARES LENS, beating down on... A MAN. Lying in the barren DESERT. Out cold. Handsome... but HAR We'll call him THE MAN IN BLACK, the color of his dirty c 2. A PINK TONGUE LICKS HIM. The man STARTS AWAKE -- to find MONGREL DOG over him. Mangy. But sweet. COUGHING, the man stumbles up. How'd he get here? And whe the hell i.: here? And -- OWWW. A GASH in his side... .. part of the wound oddly SEARED. He winces. Trying to s this painful puzzle. Something GLINTS on his wrist: A STEEL BRACELET. No clasp to pull it off. He touches the surface -- TSSS -- SHIT -- It's HOT! And there's a BLACK STETSON on the ground. The Man grabs shield his eyes... but STOFS: A WORN PHOTOGRAPH in the inner brim. A WOMAN. Young, beautiful. SMILING. The Man stares: does he KNOW this woman? is this even HIS The dog BARKS ALERT. The man turns -- QUICK -- his hand r toward his hip on INSTINCT but there's no holster. NO GUN

head_text.subj: THREE RIDERS ON HORSEBACK ARE COMING OVER THE RISE

text: THE CLAIBORNE BROTHERS -- WES, MOSE and LUKE. Dusty and t Wes gallops right up to our Man, gives him the once over
Howdy.
We're riding towards Absolution. You know how far west we are? The Man's got NO IDEA what he's talking about.
Maybe he's a dummy. Wes hops off his horse, right in The Man's face now --
There a reason you don't wanna answer my question, friend? And now, Mose nods to the BRACELET on The Man's wrist --
Wes, he's got iron on his wrist... and he's been shot.
Bet he's a chain jumper. Luke spurs his horse behind him -- The Man's SURROUNDED. 3.
If he escaped, there'll be a bounty. Let's bring him with us. Wes nods as he slides a SAWED-OFF DOUBLE-BARREL from his scabbard. COCKS both barrels. The dog GROWLS --
Not your lucky day, Stranger -- turn round and start walking. But The Man doesn't move. The Claibornes share glances. W steps forward -- RAISING HIS RIFLE --
Dead or alive, no difference. I said

THE MAN MOVES, A MECHANISM OF BRUTAL VIOLENCE -- YANKS th forward as BLAMI -- shot goes WILD -- suddenly the gun's MAN'S HANDS -- BLAXI Wes is BLOWN backwards, HOLE IN HIS As Hose draws his Enfield, The Man FLIPS the rifle again SLAM! MOSE FLIES OFF HIS SADDLE as The Man rolls -- UNDER Luke's horse -- GRABBING Luke's ankle -- suddenly Luke's his back -- BREATHLESS, staring UP at the double-barrel:

-- P-please, God -- d-don't -- -- The Man PULLS the trigger but CLICK! The rifle's EMPTY Luke's RELIEF is short as The Man SLAMS the gun-butt down knocking him out cold. And ALL of this took about ten sec This man is a cold-blooded KILLER. But somehow... he didn seem to KNOW that. CONFUSION. Drops the rifle, looks down his hands... covered in BLOOD. And the BODIES in his wake The WIND loosens a piece of PAPER from Wes's jacket. It D on the breeze -- flattens against The Stranger's foot. He it up, BLOODY FINGERPRINTS on what we now see is a TELEGR
(a hoarse whisper) Absolution...
With a HYA! The Man sends two horses GALLOPING, mounts th third, wincing at that gash in his side. Starts to trot o sees the dog following... 4.
Get outta here. Leave me alone. But the dog keeps following. Like they're FRIENDS now. Th turns away dismissively as we BOOM UP to reveal the WIDE VALLEY below... and a SPECK within it that is:

A CROOKED SIGN: "ABSOLUTION." The town is dismal and forg Crumbling buildings blistered by sun. The Man rides in -- dehydrated, the wound DRAINING him. His eyes fall on the first building he sees... A CHURCH.
BAM! The door flies open and VOTIVE CANDLES FLICKER. The looks at the dog and says --

Stay. The dog sits by the door as The Man enters -- EMPTY -- he moving -- into a small kitchen area -- bottle of whiskey uncorks it with his teeth -- drinks -- pours some on the then A PISTOL COCKS behind him -- Meet MEACHAM, town preacher, a tough, wash-foot Baptist:
Palms to heaven, Friend. The Man freezes. Turns up his hands.
Been shot.
Only two kinds of men get shot -- criminals and victims. (steps forward; hard) Which one're you?
don't know. Meacham hears the HONESTY in his voice. Knows a lost soul he sees one. Lowers his gun, softening...
Got a name, son?
Don't know that either. 5.
What do you know?
(a beat; then) ... English. Off Meacham, INTRIGUED -- we CUT TO:
A CANDLE FLAME -- a NEEDLE passing through it -- it's LAT Meacham's studying The Man's wound:

Odd wound. Looks... cauterized. (off The Man's look) Means somethin' burned it half closed. The Man just stares. News to him. And now, as Meacham lea over the wound, the METAL CROSS around his neck begins to twitch... lifting ever so SLIGHTLX off his chest -- towar strange BRACELET on the Man's wrist. Meacham reacts --
Nice trick. That some kinds... magnet? The Man looks at him -- "What the hell is a 'magnet'?!?" Meacham shrugs it off, readies the needle --
Try'n hold still. He pokes the hot needle through the wound -- The Man winc slightly, but bears the pain.
Where'd you ride in from?
West. Woke up in the desert. Looking up at the sun like I'd been dropped outta the sky.
Seems I remember a story about that happening once... fella by the name of Lucifer.
How 'bout I just call you "Luke," for short. But TheMan's distracted by his REFLECTION in a cracked mi his own face unfamiliar. Meacham nods towards The Man's H 6.
That blood yours or somebody else's?
Three men rode up. Drew on me.
My hands... moved on their own.
Anything else you wanna confess to while you got my attention? And The Man senses somehow that, ygg, there is... but:
Everything that happened before I woke up... (shakes his head) It's gone.
Well. Too bad. Can't absolve you for your sins if you don't recall 'em. That bein' said... Meacham looks up, eyes twinkling. This is not a fire n' brimstone preacher. This is a guy who GETS IT --
I seen bad men do good things and good men do bad things. Whether you end up in heaven or hell... it's not God's plan... it's yours.
You just got to remember what it was. The Man considers. Darkly --
What if I don't want to remember?

Then you're probl'y goin' to hell. On cue -- SMASH!!! The stained glass window EXPLODES as a MOLOTOV COCKTAIL hurtles into the church. FIRE spreads ar the pews -- MEACHAM ACTIVATES -- tears curtains off the confessional and uses them to STAMP OUT the fire --
Dammit -- it's Dolarhyde's men! WHOOPS and HOLLERS and GUNSHOTS outside! The Man whirls t A DOZEN MEN ON HORSEBACK, marauding through town -- 7.
Their leader is PERCY DOLARHYDE, a cocky, hot-tempered ba he ignites another Molotov, hurls it at the CLAIMS OFFICE

head_text.subj: THIS IS A MESSAGE FROM MY FATHER
CLAIM TO LAND AROUND HERE'S THE ONE WITH

text: HiS NAME ON IT! The gang rides down Main Street, HOOTING -- Percy cocks a Molotov, aiming for the SALOON -- But one of his men, half-Apache NAT COLORADO, shouts:
Percy! N2t the saloon!
Why the goddamn hell not?!
Cause your dady said so. Something LOADED in the way he emphasizes "daddy." Percy -- strange RESENTMENT between them. With a growl, Percy G OFF, chucks the flaming bottle onto the CHURCH STEPS:
Meacham finishes putting out the fire, grabbing a couple blankets as he moves past The Man --
You wanna help or are you just gonna stand there and burn?!
FRIGHTENED TOWNSPEOPLE run for the sanctuary of the churc Meacham SWATS OUT the fire on the steps --
All right, folks -- don't panic! Get inside and you'll be fine... C'mon... Meacham tosses The Man one of the blankets, nods across t street to the GENERAL STORE which is just STARTING to bur
Put it out before it gets goin'! ON THE MAN, not sure how he suddenly became the damn fire brigade, but HUSTLING across the street to --

WHIPS open the blanket, beats at the flames advancing tow roof -- PUTS THE FIRE OUT as the door FLIES OPEN and out A KID. 11. Rough n' tumble. And right now, mouth full of LICORICE. Two FULL JARS of CANDY in his hands. OOPS:
Just tryin' to save the candy. (SWALLOWS, worried now) You one of my Pa's hired guns? Before he can answer, HOOFBEATS behind them -- and here's He yanks the reins, pulls his REVOLVER on our Man --
Who the hell're yam? Whatever the opposite of Love At First Sight is, THIS is
Nobody.
Nobody is right. You think you can just collect your fifty dollars and ride off? You signed up for the wrong side, boy. The kid's scared. The Man ISN'T, despite the gun in his f
Tell you what. You get down on your knees and kiss my boot. The Man's eyes narrow --
You do that and I'll let you run back to wherever the hell you came from so you can tell whoever you see... (cocks his gun) Absolution belongs -tg..th-e- 1Dolar es.
You want me to kiss your boot? Percy extends his boot just INCHES from The Man's face:

Tongue's just fine if you're feelin' amorous. Don't hold ba -- THWIP! The Man YANKS Percy's boot off his foot in one qui move and KWHAM!!!1 WINGS IT RIGHT INTO PERCY'S FACE! Percy FLIES off the HORSE -- The Man grabbing his rifle - moment Percy lands, it's STICKING into his NECK: 9.
Kiss this, you sonofa --
-- Nat Colorado gallops around the corner, SHOTGUN RAISED
Goddamnit, Nat -- SHOOT HIM!!! -- but The Man yanks Percy up by his collar, using him as SHIELD between himself and Colorado. Eerily calm --
Wherever you came from? Go back. Colorado knows he's dealing with a PROFESSIONAL. MORE GAN MEMBERS ride up, surprised -- a dirty outlaw, GREAVEY, ba
Sheriff's right behind us, Nat!
You goddamned shitheels! Don't you even THINK about leavin' me!!!! Colorado -- DECISION -- doesn't take long -- glares at Th
Be seeing you.
Look forward to it. With that, Nat spurs his horse -- YA! The others follow h he RIDES HARD out of town. Percy growls at The Man --
You are a dead man. You hear me? So help me God I will kill you my-- DM! The Man's SMASHES Percy's skull with the gun, knockin OUT COLD, as LAWMEN approach on horseback --
FA! He caught Percy Dolarhyde! SHERIFF KYLE TAGGART rears up on his horse. Tall, dark an handsome despite a SADNESS in his eyes, already dismounti
Emmett -- you all right? The Kid (now EMMETT) strides towards his father excitedly 10.
a-f lap jack- then-stared-down-Nat-Colorado- like-he-wasn't-even-scared!!!! Taggart turns to The Man now, cautious, but grateful --
Pardon my boy, mister. He can be excitable. (puts out his hand) Kyle Taggart. The Man shakes Taggart's hand. A beat. Then --
. Luke.
Well I'm in your debt, Luke. Tune of fifty dollars, actually. (off The Man's look) Our advert? The telegram? The Man NODS -- Oh, RIGHT.
Could use a man like you in case any of 'em come back...
-- I'm just passing through.

Fair enough. You don't mind spending the night, bank opens in the morning... I'll get you your money then. (nods down the street) Saloon's got rooms. You just tell Maria I sent you. The Man tips his hat, nods to Emmett (still STARSTRUCK), to go. Taggart furrows his brow as the DOG scampers after
You here with the prospector woman? The Man stops. Intrigued. Turns back --
woman?
Yup. Real looker. Came into town yesterday with that there dog. She a friend of yours? 11. ON THE MAN. His first real LEAD.
Maybe. And as The Man heads off, we HOLD ON TAGGART, his spidey- tingling that all is not RIGHT with this...
Somethin' wrong, Kyle?
What's that French sayin' where you swear you seen someone before?
Don't speak French.
No... you sure's hell don't. Taggart takes one last look at The Man departing as we CU
300 head of CATTLE under a blood red sky -- BOOM DOWN to RANCH HANDS by a fire. One's drinking liberally from a BO call him ROY CLANTON. The other two trade glances, nervou
Should take it easy there, Pal --
Mr. Dolarhyde don't like it when we drink on the job.
I don't give a damn what he don't like -- gotta sit here and babysit a damn herd of cattle. Dolarhyde ain't gonna do squat. (rises; grabs his
Gotta see a man about a buffalo... He lets out a big BURP and stumbles off behind a ridge. M THUNDER. Something doesn't feel right. A sudden WHOOSH an

text: JUST LIKE THE APACHES IN OUR OPENING! Flies STRAIGHT UP, FRAME. Its PLAINTIVE MOO blending into all the others:
You hear that?
Hear what? 12. ANOTHER COW zips up from the herd behind them. And ANOTHE MANY OF THE SWSSHS. The men slowly turn toward the sound

THE DARKNESS EXPLODES WITH EERILY BRILLIANT BLUE LIGHT
SCREAM AS THEY'RE ENGULFED IN IT AND --

text: ROY CLANTON -- comes RUNNING back up the hill, pulling up pants as the light DISAPPEARS -- to find the men GONE. So the COWS. PULL BACK... he's ALL THAT'S LEFT in the open r

THE BATWING DOORS SWING OPEN: The Man In Black enters wit dog, tips his hat to a couple WHORES. They GRIN, liking w they see. RANCH HANDS drink their pay. Behind the bar, a and WOMAN argue. DOC and MARIA; she's a buxom Mexican bea he's 300 roly-poly pounds of ANXIOUS CASTILIAN JEALOUSY:
-- I know you are, don't lie to me!
How many times do we have to do this, Arturo? J. love you.

Really? Do you?!? (holds up a POCKETWATCH) I found this in our bed! And I don't k3 Vg. a watch, Maria. I can't AfjQrd a watch because y insisted we buy this saloon! She looks at him SQUARELY -- yes, some SECRET withheld. A Man In Black reaches the bar, he's Maria's EXCUSE to end
We have customers. And MOVES off. Doc stomps toward the exit -- sees EMMETT back of the bar stealing sips of BEER from left-behind gl
Emmett RUNS OUT. The Man sits beside an old cuss named AT The dog heels at The Man's feet, eyes a STEAK on Atticus'
That mutt makes a move for my steak, I'll drill him down. 13.

Shut up, Atticus. This is the man who took out Percy Dolarhyde. Atticus grumbles and goes back to eating, but not before sweeping his duster aside to show the GUN in his holster. rolls her eyes, sets a GLASS in front of The Man, who nod
I'm looking for a woman. She gestures to the WHORES --
What kind?
This kind. He removes the PHOTO from inside his hat. The one of the

Never seen her before. But she is beautiful. (pours him whiskey; then one for herself) Here's to you finding her, Senor. ON THE MAN. Not exactly sure he WANTS to. But they CLINK glasses, knock 'em back. Maria pours him another:
You have any idea what kind of mess you just stepped into?
No. But I figured I'd be safe in here seein' as how that boy I tossed off his horse didn't wanna burn your saloon. Maria's eyes go down. Somehow GUILTY. But then:
It's not the boy you should worry about.
It's his papa.
POV: UPSIDE DOWN, A MAN, surrounded by his RANCH HANDS -- FACE just out of the light, hat brim lowered under an oil
Name's Woodrow Dolarhyde. I'm what you might call, the Tall Hog at the trough. 14. His face comes INTO light: 50's, tailored finery, patent Wellington boots that bespeak wealth. HARD. Exudes POWER:

You're Roy, right? Clanton, is it? Been working for me two weeks now, and I haven't had the pleasure. Our POV belongs to ROY CLANTON, the ranch hand from the c abductions. TERRIFIED -- his arms and legs TIED TO THE SA OF TWO HORSES, kicking dirt in front of Dolarhyde's RANCH
Mr. Dolarhyde, I... I swear I didn't
-- a VIOLENT "SSST" from Dolarhyde JOSTLES the horses -- STRETCHING Roy tight enough to SNAP -- he SCREAMS --
Best not to interrupt me, Roy, makes the horses skittish.
You partial to history? Here's a primer,
He pulls out a WHIP, gripping it by its STERLING SILVER H Starts CIRCLING the horses as he lets the whip UNFURL:

Following the War Of Northern Aggression -- what some ironically refer to as the "Civil" War -- came a prodigious nation- wide market for beef. Cowtowns sprang up all along these prairies, Roy; populated by enterprising young drovers -- among 'em, my daddy, Jeremiah Dolarhyde. Sold six of his gold teeth and a sword gifted to him by Robert E. Lee for twenty of the scrawniest Longhorns you ever saw -- then turned 'em into the fattest herd West of the Chisholm Trail. (stops: the WHIP) Watched him work this lash, driving those steer til his fingers bled... but what good's a whip without a herd, Roy? And slowly, torturously, SWEEPS the whip tip in the dirt.
Mr. Dolarhyde, Sir, you gotta believe me -- I went to take a piss and and -- saw a light in the sky -- blue -- and when I ran back the cows and fellas were gone! 15.

The sky. Opened up. And took my cows. Incoming HOOFBEATS -- Dolarhyde looks up to see COLORADO rest of the GANG returning from Absolution. A WOMAN emerges from the servant's quarters. APACHE. 50's Beautiful. As the men REAR, Nat Colorado MEETS EYES with A relationship we don't understand yet as Dolar strides u
Where's Percy?
Jail. Sheriff locked him up. Dolar darkens. Unsheathes a KNIFE. Looks down at Roy:
When're these people gonna lgarn? He STABS the knife down... SLICING the rope tethered to R FEET. His lower body SLUMPS to the ground, he breathes a
Dolar SLAPS the horse's rump, to which Roy's UPPER TORSO tied; it GALLOPS off, dragging a SCREAMING ROY into the n
Everyone saddle up. Got us a sheriff to kill. As he MOVES OFF, Dolarhyde's eyes go to the Apache Woman. Something passes between them. She seems CONCERNED.
Wasn't the sheriff, got him caught. It was a stranger. That STOPS Dolarhyde. He turns back, face dark:
... What stranger?
Usually a man gives off a scent. Where he's been. What he's done.
He didn't have one.
A BULLET, in close up, twirling between the thumb and for of SHERIFF TAGGART. Boots up on his desk, TROUBLED. Deputy Wade pours himself a cup from a TIN POT OF COFFEE:
Percy wouldn't've come in shooting without his daddy's say-so, Kyle. You best get ready for a war 'cause that's what's comin'.
Tomorrow we ride the little shit up Phoenix way, turn him over. Dolarhyde's got a beef, he can take it up with the 6th cavalry. Taggart's on his feet, grabs his JACKET off the door --
Goddamn tired of this... fatass rancher scaring good people off their lan-- He STOPS. Something catches his eye on the posting board. YANKS a piece of paper off, a mixture of CONFUSION and CO
Sonofabitch. WHAT DOES HE SEE? Before we get a chance to KNOW --
EMMETT'S FACE rises into frame, peering into the saloon f below a windowsill. Sees THE MAN IN BLACK at the bar as -
-- he SLUGS back a shot, the dog at his feet, still eyein steak on Atticus' plate. The Man points to his GLASS:
Another.
You drink like a man who wants to forget.
(haunted; the irony) Other way round. The dog WHINES AGAIN for the steak. Atticus SLAMS down hi silverware. Draws his GUN -- 17.
You got three seconds to get your dog outta here or I blow his balls off.
(without a blink) Not my dog.
Q=... two... -- and just before "three"... CA-CLICK. Atticus FREEZES, because there's a RIFLE BARREL at the back of h,iS head n

Give you odds you don't get to 'three.' RACK TO FIND the person holding the rifle is A WOMAN. Beautiful. EXOTIC. Dressed in leather. Meet ELLA SWENSON. ON THE MAN IN BLACK. Can't help himself. immediate and undeniable CHEMISTRY. But she pays him no mind -- makes a sound and the dog snaps to her side. Atticus uncocks his slowly slides it back in the holster --
I was just havin' some fun, Miss --
Give- him, the steak. Atticus HESITATES, angry at the humiliation. Ella PRESSES GUN HARDER against his neck, lowering him -- and his plat the floor. Right in front of the dog, who GROWLS --
Now say you're sorry.
(biting his tongue) I'm-- sorry.
His name's 'Happy.' HappyBARES HIS TEETH. INCHES from Atticus' face
I'm sorry... 'Happy.'
Alright then. (lowers her rifle) You're right. That was fun. 18. -- Atticus scrambles back to his feet and OUT the door, a looks at the Man In Black:
What're you doing with my dog?
I was hoping you could tell me.
The hell're you talking ab--? WRIST BRACELET. Surprise and REVELATION:
Where... did you get that? Before he can answer, SHERIFF TAGGART enters, along with WADE (carrying a SHOTGUN), and 5 other deputies. They mov cautiously to THE MAN, like he's a powder keg about to go
Hey there, "Luke." Mind following me down to the office so we can have us a chat...?
What for?
All due respect, I'm the law, mister. That's what for. The men LOCK EYES:
Tell you what, Sheriff. How about you keep the fifty dollars you owe me and I just walk outta here like we. never met?
Because we did meet. ON ELLA. For reasons we're not sure of, the idea of The M leaving ALARMS her. All the Gunslingers' hands are POISED holsters. The Man stays preternaturally COOL:
L can't be accountable for what happens if they draw on me.
And what's gonna happen? 19.
Best you don't find out.
Now why'd you have to go and say that? Taggart gives a nod and the men start to CONVERGE --

(low; genuine plea) Don't. But Charlie makes a MOVE and The Man SLAMS his head into -- the NEXT GUNMAN reaches for his pistol -- The Man PUNC THROAT -- SLAMS the third into a bench -- The FOURTH stra down on the Faro table -- TAGGART levels his REPEATER -- but The Man just GRABS the as Taggart FIRES a ROUND into the ceiling -- now the rifl THE MAN'S HANDS and just before he PULLS THE TRIGGER on T HE SEES EMMETT AT THE WINDOW. About to watch his father's MURDER... and The Man LOWERS the gun:

I told you, I don't wanna hurt anyb-- CRACK! The butt of a PISTOL WHIPS the side of his SKULL! Man DROPS as we REVEAL who just knocked his ass OUT: ELLA! Taggart draws a gun and pins The Man, whipping out piece of paper he pulled from his office...
Yup -- looks just like him.

head_text.subj: NOW WE IT'S A WANTED POSTER WITH THE MAN'S FACE ON IT

text: "Jake Lonergan. Scourge a' The Territories. Wanted Dead or Alive." And The Man... now forever known as JAKE... stares WOOZIL his OVERTURNED HAT... the photo tucked inside of the BEAU WOMAN... her image goes BLURRY... then mil{:

1.) A tilted, handmade trail sign: "SAGUARO PASS." 2.) We're in a CABIN somewhere. BLINDING ULTRAVIOLET LIGH EXPLODES INTO THE CABIN, against which a DEMONIC SILHOUET appears -- it looks like an INDIAN IN FULL-FEATHER HEADDR 20.

looks at us and SCREAMS -- 4.) Now we're someplace VERY DARK -- a cave? As some kind TERRIFYING OCULAR PROBE lowers right in front of our eyes 5.) Now we're RUNNING through the cave -- ESCAPE -- BREAT HARD -- a LIGHT at the end of the tunnel -- BLINDING SUN as we emerge -- our eyes ADJUST to see: 6.) A STRANGE ROCK FORMATION on the rim of a canyon -- li STONE TOWER pointing to heaven as the SUN WHITEWASHES US
JAKE'S EYES OPEN and he GASPS AIR! His POV: a FACE comes FOCUS -- PERCY DOLARHYDE. GRINNING at him from the next c
You're a dead. Jake sits up. Woozy. Blinking back to reality.

My daddy's comin' for me, Boy. You're gonna end up another dead shitheel under his spurs. I am gonna watch you suffer for a long, long -- Jake moves LIGHTNING QUICK -- reaching through the bars, GRABBING PERCY'S COLLAR, YANKING FORWARDS -- SLAMMING Per head into the bars, KNOCKING hIM OUT COLD AGAIN. Percy DR
Shut up. Jake sits back on his cot, rubbing his still-throbbing he

A PRISON WAGON pulls up in front of the Sheriff's office, with Taggart's GUNMEN on horseback. ELLA takes frame as t dismount and head into the office -- she pursues DEPUTY W with a real sense of PURPOSE:
I need to see Lonergan. It's important.
'Fraid not, Miss -- we're preppin' him for transport. And pushes PAST her, into the office with the men. HOLD o -- dammit, she NEEDS to find a way in there. 21.
A KEY in the LOCK as the cell door OPENS: Sheriff Taggart the gunmen. GLARING at Jake, then noticing Percy --
What happened to him?
Man walked into a bar. Taggart shakes his head as Charlie and a deputy unlock Pe cell, CUFF HIM, drag him out. Taggart points to Jake:
Step back against the wall there. Move and I shoot you dead.
(as he does) You should've let me go.
Yeah, I should've shot you in your knee. You put down six of my deputies.
Six was all you had.
Hell, they're gonna love you in Phoenix.
Yeah? What's in Phoenix?
What you got comin', Jake Lonergan. Taggart reaches into his shirt, pulls out a pair of GLASS Slips them on his nose. Takes out that WANTED poster and

Aggravated banditry, 17 counts, Forgery, Blackmail, Hijacking, injurious use of a cattle prod, Arson, Incitement of Whorehouse Riot, and Trespassing with intent to deflower. You're also leader of a gang of outlaws includin' Creek Johnson and Bull McCade, which makes you accessory to every law they broke too.
(after a long BEAT:) That it? 22.
Saved the best for last... 'Murder.' That LANDS on Jake. Wondering if this is TRUE. Evenly --
It say who I killed?
Prostitute outta Mojave, name of Alice Wills. Taggart rises, removes Jake's BLACK STETSON from a hook o wall, pulls that PHOTOGRAPH OF THE WOMAN from the inner b
If I were a bettin' man, I'd say this would be Ms. Wills, would it not? Jake just stares, CONFUSED. SHAKEN.
They found her dead in a cabin round Saguaro Pass, twenty miles west of here. With that, a CLUE falls into place: SAGUARO PASS.
Deed was in your name. He slips the photo back in the brim, tosses the hat to Ja

Dead hooker with a hole in her chest, in your cabin, plus your sterling reputation equals guilty as goddamned sin. (draws his GUN) And you're gonna hang for it. At gunpoint, Taggart PUSHES Jake out the door --

Against the RISING SUN, Dolarhyde and 15 GUNMEN ride hard to the teems. They REAR in the hills above Absolution. Do looks down through BINOCULARS as NAT COLORADO turns to... an incoming WIND. Across the valley, a massive BLACK CLOU is starting to SWIRL. Violent BLUE FLASHES within. Eerie.
blue light... Clanton said he saw blue light before the cows disappeared...
Just a storm. 23.
No storm I've ever seen... I say we wait 'til it passes. But Dolar isn't listening. THROUGH HIS BINOCULARS: he see PERCY being carried into the prison wagon. Followed by Ja
No time, they put him in an iron coach. With a HYA! he's OFF, the others FOLLOWING with reluctant -- still SPOOKED by that incoming STORM:
As Jake's loaded into the prison wagon after the still- unconscious Percy, he SEES MEACHAM through the barred win The preacher flashes SYMPATHY as Wade takes out the cuff
Gimme your wrist. Jake holds out his hands. Wade unlocks one wrist, freeing cuff... then takes that cuff and LOCKS IT to Percy's wris
What're you --?
Best way to make a man stay put: chain him to his enemy.

You lovebirds have a nice trip now. SLAM: the door CLOSES and LOCKS. Jake SIGHS and tries to back, but it's hard tethered to Percy's slumped form. Shi Then QWW -- something starts to STING and he looks down: HIS BRACELET. Has started PULSING RED. And it's getting W Jake stares -- ON EDGE -- what the hell's happening? As - OUTSIDE, Taggart mounts the buckboard. EMMETT feeds the h
You sure he's a bad guy, Pa? He did give Percy a lickin'.
He's bad enough.
(not so sure, but --) . can I come with you?

What he sees is SHOCKING: It's an OVAL CAPSULE OF BLUE GOO, the outer layer some ki TRANSLUCENT COCOON. Suspended within the murky Jell-o is GE, DEC SHAPE. Motionless. UH-OH. The others draw guns too, converging around it in equal S and FEAR. But the thing doesn't MOVE.
Should we... open it?
Should we open it? Hell NO we shouldn--

-- oops -- -- and now we find Emmett's already POKING it with a stic Small TEAR in the cocoon's outer embryonic layer -- GOO l then it RUPTURES, EXPLODING as the horses REAR away, WHIN the goo spreads across the desert floor, thinning out. BEAT. Everyone wipes blue shit off their clothes as they FACE-TO-FACE with the object inside, lying there on the g A COW. YES, A COW. Motionless. DEAD, in fact. A METAL TUBE jammed in its mou connected to a VALVE in the now-flaccid bubble's outer sh Greavey notices a BRANDING on the cow's rump -- the lette
Boss... it's one'a yours. Dolarhyde's eyes NARROW. Emmett looks at Doc, SCARED:
Is-- is this what happened to my Pa? Doc dismounts. Moves to the cow's mouth and PULLS OUT THA with a wet SQUISHING sound. Thinking it through:

This was stuck down its throat... to help it breathe. That means they wanted to keep it alive, Emmett. (forces a small smile) I'm sure your father is fine. But Doc's eyes aren't sure. Meacham looks back to the sky 46.
Why'd they dump it?
Whatever they needed from it, they must've got.
Gonna get dark soon, need to keep moving. She does. The others FOLLOW in a chilled daze. The last i DOLARHYDE, glancing back at his dead cow with angry eyes.
Now our people APPEAR riding up a ridge... Dolarhyde shoo HAND, bringing the caravan to a STOP. Once again, SHOCK:

Ho-ly shit. BOOM UP to reveal a SURREAL SIGHT in the valley below: AGAMBLING RIVERBOAT. Nose buried in the sand, paddlewheel facing the sky, as if it'd been dropped from the clouds i desert. Just like that cow. Off their LOOKS --
TRACKING alongside of the TILTED PADDLEBOAT, our team rid around it. Trying to make SENSE. STENCILED on the stern i
"Colorado Queen."

The river's two hundred miles from here. But Ella doesn't seem as impressed as the rest of them. I fact, her attention is drawn BEHIND them, to something co over the DUNES... the barest flicker of a smile --

Son of a bitch. IT'S JAKE ON HORSEBACK. Followed by another horse, with COLORADO in the saddle. Wrists tied but ALIVE. As Jake ri to a stop, he PUSHES Colorado off the horse -- the indian the ground with a THUD as Jake levels Dolarhyde with HARD

Your man got it in his head that he was s'posed to kill me. I'm holding onto his ear 'til he says sorry. 47. As Colorado stumbles to his feet angrily, humiliated, Dol notices his BLOODY EAR. The LOBE has been SHOT OFF. He lo up at Jake, half-angry, half-EMBARRASSED --
Why'd you let him live? Jake's hard-as-nails. DRIVEN now --
Gonna need him. He rides past Dolar to Ella. Stops. Says, simply:
Nice boat. (then... SNIFFS) What's that smell?
That'd be me. He realizes her shirt's caked in the BLUE GOO from the co
Why're you blue?
Cause I missed ya. Their look HOLDS. A MOMENT. Something REAL between them.
We better keep movin'. A THUNDERCRACK. On the horizon, sheets of RAIN.
Storm's comin'. I say we dig in here til it passes. (to Colorado; fucking
How's that sound, Nat? Nat BURNS. Dolar feels his AUTHORITY being undermined:
Storm or no storm, I say we keep movin'. Colorado finally turns to Uolarhyde. DEFIANT:
Too hard tracking anything in the rain. 48. Dolarhyde GLARES at Colorado, who GLARES BACK: his loyalt in QUESTION. The tide IS turning against the rancher.

RAIN POURS on the overturned boat. Horses tethered. The A CORPSE has been moved onto a slanted deck, covered by a T WE TILT TO THE ALIEN'S HAND. Poking out. Motionless. HOLD it, longer than we're comfortable.

A RATTLESNAKE is coiled around a CHANDELIER... except the chandelier is on the floor and the floor is the CEILING. Upended gambling tables. WOODRATS scurry over FOOD. Every window's SMASHED... as if something just TOOK everyone. Dolar sits by a FIRE made from furniture parts, drinking WHISKEY FLASK. Colorado opposite, rubbing his MANGLED EAR
You okay?
(low, eyes averted) Yeah. Dolar pours some whiskey on a BANDANA, leans towards Colo
Lemme clean it for you or it'll get -- -- I'm fine. Dolarhyde backs away. Colorado GLARES.
Say it.
(after a beat) Is Percy worth dyin' for? Dolar's eyes flash. A mixture of anger and PAIN. Then --
He's my son.

I take care of my kin, Nat. ON COLORADO as that lands. Clearly, there's something her a bond that seems to go deeper than just boss and employe WHAT? Finally Nat just gets up and LEAVES. Dolar watches him go, takes a healthy SWIG. Hears a WHIMP Looks over and sees... EMMETT, huddled in a corner. CRYIN 49. ON DOLARHYDE. The kid's naked emotion AFFECTING him, but fact Dolar might have a conscience makes him ANGRY too. L
Hey. Kid. Emmett looks up, SNIFFLES. Dolar tosses him the WHISKEY F
Take a drink and shut p. He gets up, walks off. Leaving the kid with the flask. As Emmett looks at it confusedly, stuffs it in his POCKET --
Meacham has set out TIN PANS under holes to collect RAIN Dumps a pan into his CANTEEN as Doc enters with COFFEE fo
(re: the tin plates) We brought enough water.
Not for drinkin', it's for blessin'. Doc nods: ah. Turns to go... STOPS. Turns back. Intense e
Padre... Maria came to see you in confession every Sunday. It seemed... she had a lot to talk about. (beat, this is hard) Was she having an affair? Meacham removes his spectacles. Looks at Doc --
You know I can't say. And Doc DOES know. But there's a quiet DESPERATION here -
The last thing I said to her... I... (shakes his head; then) Please. If I'm wrong about my wife... I don't want to die angry. Meacham sees the PAIN in his friend's eyes.
You can ask Maria if she was cheatin' on you once we get her back. 'Til then? (bit of a grin) Don't die. 50. And OFF DOC, thunder CRACKS --

RAIN pours down through an open gash in the roof, splashi floor. Ella enters, glances back toward the door to make she's alone, then pulls off her shirt and folds it over a Upper body NAKED in the moonlight. We catch only a FLASH this, and for a moment it's PURE HOTNESS... . until she turns and something ELSE is revealed: criss- crossed LASH MARKS on her back. She turns away and starts to SPLASH herself with water, e the blue goo and dirt from her skin and face... then: A M ignites behind her. She WHIRLS, startled, covering her br with her arms -- JAKE is sitting in a chair at the Commod desk, casually lighting a cheroot in his mouth:
You missed a spot.
The hell,-re- you doing here?
Mindin' my own business. (snaps out the match) Then you decided to take a shower.
Why didn't you say anything?

Givin' you privacy. She throws her shirt on, but her skin's wet and the shirt to her, celebrating her shape in a way that can't be igno Jake tosses her his jacket. As she slips it on, she notic bottle of WHISKEY on the table... and the PHOTOGRAPH OF A
. she's pretty. (Jake says NOTHING) Who was she? Jake's quiet. DARK. Intense emotion, intensely suppressed
only thing I know's her name was Alice...
And she's dead. Ella looks up at him. INTO him -- 51.
Maybe you loved her. Jake shakes his head, sort of mumble/chuckles in RESISTAN
All you women are the same -- Always wanna make it about Goddamn "love."
Trust me, Lonergan. I'm not the same. There is a force -- a strength about this woman -- that h connects with. But remains, true to character, ALOOF:
Don't matter. She takes a step closer. Soft. Intimate.
So what dj= matter? Jake just looks at her. Then, lifts the cheroot to his li the FLARE of its tip casting him in a demonic light...
What matters is I find the thing that killed her. (dark as hell) And make it pay. And now, he leans forward with a focused LOOK... holds up
Where'd you see this before? A beat. Ella -- somehow CONTAINED -- opens her mouth to l But he cuts her off --
-- and don't lie to me. You wouldn't've asked me if you didn't recognize it. Ella tightens. PAIN in her eyes. And Jake REALIZES:
Those things... they the ones who put those marks on your back? She swallows: a mixture of SHAME that he's found her out. ANGER at what was done to her. 52.
They took my people. Destroyed where I'm from.
Where's that?
North of here. Been trackin' 'em ever since, town to town. Best I figure, they're hidin' in a mine. Jake CONSIDERS all this. Softens a little:
Maybe if you'd told me the truth instead of throwin' rocks at me --
-- what, you would've stuck around? Bullshit. I couldn't've turned you away from what you had to do, any more than I could've stopped these people from going after their kin.
Truth ain't worth a damn, Jake... and we're gonna need all the guns we can get. Their look HOLDS... until Jake SMIRKS. Likes her style:
So that's the only reason you wanted me to come with you? Cause of my gun? There's a pause... then Ella SMIRKS back:
No, not your gun.

What you do with it. Among the many things these two ate feeling -- both separ and together -- the one that pops right now is ATTRACTION Confusing as it is for him. The pregnant moment LINGERS.. Until Happy suddenly starts to GROWWWWL, sensing somethin outside. ANOTHER CRACK OF THUNDER as:
The horses STAMP NERVOUSLY out the window as Greavey and rest of Dolarhyde's men (COBBETT and 4 others) HUDDLE in conference -- whispers that sound a lot like MUTINY -- 53.
What the hell're we doin' here? We should be ridin' in the opposite direction of those things --
We do that, the old man's likely to shoot us himself. Only way outta this is -- And suddenly. Greavey SNIFFS the air, FROWNS:
. what's that smell? -- as they TURN to the deck where the creature lays... AL

Off Emmett's WIDE, GAPING EYES...

(looks off --) West. Greavey and the others share a LOOK. E o Turn to Dolar -- 57.
Boss, only took one of them things to kill four of us. We got no chance here. Dolarhyde BURNS -- knowing he's being ABANDONED --
You're a goddamn coward. (to the others) You work for me, dammit. You're my m e 1 1 Qyees. And Greavey, finally FREE to speak his mind, says SPITEFU
Fine line between a coward and a fool. The men turn tail and RIDE AWAY. Dolarhyde SHOUTS after t

Looks like they finally found something to be more scared of than you. Dolarhyde feels his world CRUMBLING away man by man... Ella trots alongside Jake, who's staring at that DARK CLO overhead with a bad feeling:
Clouds've been moving east since sun- up... 'cept that one. ON ELLA. We SENSE she knows something, something more she saying. SNAPS her reins and they RIDE OFF:
As the group gallops into a BOX CANYON, Happy starts BARK MADLY -- the horses SLOW --

BLAMBLAN1111 GUNSHOTS from above suddenly PEPPER the grou the horses REAR and KICK UP, startled -- A DOZEN FIGURES ON THE CLIFFS ALL AROUND THEM. Badass OUT with RIFLES aimed at our heroes. One of them CALLS DOWN: 58.

text: SLOWLY, Jake draws his gun... tosses it. Now the rest of As they SEE -- TWO RIDERS -- incoming -- from the other e the canyon. Rifles aimed and ready. Happy GROWLS... One of the outlaws knocks back the hammer on his rifle --
I say we just shoot 'em and take their-- But the words catch in his throat as his EYES WIDEN:
. Boss? Sure enough, they're looking right at (BRONC -JAKE. Both outlaws and HUNT) lower their guns, hostility replaced by SURPRIS

Jesus, Boss... Creek's gonna shit when he sees you. (then; re: the others) And who the hell're they? ON JAKE. Now does he handle this? Ht:nt rides up next to SUSPICIOUS, and for reasons yet to be known, UNFRIENDLY -

Since when're Qy the one asking the goddamned questions!?! Ella and our people REACT as Jake plays it up, beat defen good OFFENSE. The outlaws are SCARED: this is the Lonerga know. Hunt holds his BLOODY MOUTH: 59.
Christ, Jake... You broke my tooth
Quit whining. Now bring me to the rest of the boys, if that meets with your goddamn approval. Bronc and Hunt nod, mounting up, SHOUTING to the OUTLAWS

text: As they RIDE OFF, Dolarhyde looks to Jake and mutters:
Nice company you keep.
What the hell're you doing? If we don't catch up to that kid, we're never gonna--
They called me "Boss." You wanna go after these things with five or fifty? (off her look) Like you said: we can use every gun we can get. Qh. That actually makes SENSE. But --
What exactly're you gonna say to 'em?
Tell you when I figure it out. And he SPURS onward, leaving her to follow uneasily --

OUR ALIEN HANGS UPSIDE DOWN from stalactites by four spin limbs. Mid sleep cycle. And inches below its head... EMMETT, still webbed to the wall. Unable to move or speak TERRIFIED. As suddenly... the cube DEACTIVATES. And DROPS THE CREATURE'S EYES SNAP OPEN. It SPRINGS from the ceilin FOUR DARK SHAPES blot out light, GLIDING IN...

A gang of FOUR MORE ALIENS dismounts. The biggest and STR -- their LEADER -- barks GUTTURAL CLICKS at the alien who kidnapped Emmett. Kidnapper explaining as it removes anot STRANGE DEVICE. The device beams a HOLO-PROJECTION... OF ELLA'S FACE! The aliens HISS in furious RECOGNITION. JESUS... is this some kind of otherworldly WANTED POSTER? PLUMES fan out angrily from the Leader's HUGE, ELONGATED like an indian headdress! The creature TURNS to Emmett -- It's the alien who killed Jake's woman! We'll come to kno as... THE SLAVER. It MOVES OMINOUSLY for Emmett, grasping the HANDLE of som that UNCOILS with fluid, frightening speed: A WHITE-HOT LASER WHIP. This will be The Slaver's SIGNATU WEAPON. It spirals to its full length, FLASHING out at -- EMMETT -- MUFFLED SCREAM! But... the whip DOESN'T cut him instead it SLICES THROUGH THE WEBBING that pins the boy t wall. As Emmett FALLS, The Slaver SWEEPS HIM UP -- Emmett FLAILS, punching, kicking to no avail -- but then:
Tumbles from Emmett's pocket and SPLASHES WHISKEY on The -- IT.. S[iRIEM WILDLI-Aa THE BOOZE CONTACTS FLESH, SKIN EMMETT -- tumbles away. Terror turns to REVELATION as he the webbing from his mouth:

Holy SHIT. Another alien LUNGES for the kid but Emmett SPLASHES him the flask -- the alien RECOILS, flesh BUBBLING -- Emmett whirls -- sees the HOVERBIKES -- JUMPS onto one, t desperately at the controls --- IiON-DO , i12'T THIS TURN WO ?!! Another Alien SCUTTLES in FAST -- Emmett's scrambl boots slide into the foot supports, which automatically W CLOSED as the bike THROTTLES FORWARD... DECAPITATING THE The bike SPINS UNCONTROLLABLY, plasma thrusters SCORCHING and setting two more aliens ABLAZE! The speeder KAMIKAZE BOUNCES out of the cavern at 90 MPH, Emmett screaming! The Slaver SCREECHES FURIOUSLY as the remaining creatures back on their speeders and GIVE CHASE!

Climbing onto an old desert stump -- BLAM! It's SHOT OFF couple DRUNK OUTLAWS, swigging booze from STOLEN WHISKEY piled on a WAGON. We're in an OUTLAW CAMP: roughly 40 fas and saddle tramps. Tents. Horses. Ample weapons. And righ now, most of them are GEARING UP to ride out for some rea One of them, CREEK JOHNSON, with a chewed up face like sw cheese, slides a RIFLE into his saddle and shouts to the
Hey --- i12s 4 Lay off that whiskey and saddle up. Flyer's on its way and we best damn be sober for it.
Creek turns; sees HUNT and BRONC crest the hill with the OUTLAWS from the cliffs. ANGRILY:
'Bout time you got back. (re: Hunt's bloody nose) What the hell happened to you?!? Hunt nods over his shoulder --
He did. The outlaws part to reveal JAKE, riding in with Ella and rest of our people. Creek's eyes NARROW, NOT happy to see

well, shit. It gets very, VERY QUIET. Our people tread warily, knowin whatever reaction Jake's eliciting, it AIN'T GOOD. He run gaunt of ACCUSING GLARES. Smart enough to know that CREEK the man in charge. Dismounts:
You don't look happy to see me, Creek. Creek eyes him. TOUGH. Clearly, HISTORY here:
We're fixin' to rob us a train in about twenty minutes and you come ridin' in like nothin' ever happened?
No. Lonergan. I ain't happy to see you. ON JAKE. How to navigate bad blood that he doesn't REMEMB 62.
Well I'm sure you'll get over it. Then, pretty much DISMISSING Creek, Jake turns, addresses rest of the men. If he's their boss? Hi12 _gQDn&. CT LIR
Nice to see you, Boys, but we're not going after a train -- We're going after something else. The men seem... . CONFUSED. Not sure what the hell is GOI
But Jake... you-- you said you didn't wanna be in charge no more. And this is a REVELATION. Jake glances at ELLA -- has to IMPROVISING to hold his ground:
Well, I-- changed my mind. So saddle the hell up.
They're not going anywhere with you. Creek's heard enough. Strides forward, a direct CHALLENGE

You got some balls on you -- walkin' outta here a week ago sayin' what you said and doin' what you did and then ridin' back in here and givin orders. Just who the hell do you think you are? The IRONY of the question isn't lost on Jake, as Creek wa right up to Ella. CLOSE. Violates her space: studies her a mixture of curiosity and CONTEMPT.
So. Are you her?
Am I who?

The whore Jake quit this gang for. OH. Another piece of the puzzle falls into place -- Jake' SNAP to Ella as they both REALIZE... the men think she's " e." Jake does his best to stay cool, meets Creek's star

Or what? These boys are with = now. jID in charge. You may be fast, but you are goddamned outgunned. ON JAKE. OUR HEROES. Shit. Jake turns to the men --
That a fact, Boys? But Creek doesn't wait for them to respond:
Put your guns on the whore. He so much as twitches, blow her brains out her ear. AT ONCE, 10 GUNS ARE LEVELED AT ELLA'S HEAD. No doubt as the men are LOYAL to. But Jake locks into Creek, UNFLINCH
Call her a whore again, that'll be the last word you ever say.
You ain't in no position to make threats, asshole. Hunt: take his gun. Hunt reluctantly scrambles over to Jake, oh-so-carefully the PISTOL from Jake's holster:
Sorry, Boss... nothin' personal. Creek now turns to BULL MCCADE, roughly the size of a BAR

Bull PUNCHES Jake back into oblivion, and on the HI MEMORY FLASECUTi PEACEFUL SILENCE -- two FACES staring at other across a pillow -- Jake and ALICE, naked, in a WHOR
You sure you wanna give it all up? ON JAKE. Clearly TORN. But just as clearly, in LOVE.
What about you? Once we're gone, you ain't ever comin' back. She touches his face so gently. And whispers:

You're the first person ever believed I was better than this place... so I gotta believe in y=. (and she KISSES him) You're a good man, Jake Lonergan. PRESENT: as the words "Good Man" ECHO back to Jake. Stir= ]1az1n as Creek GRABS Jake's hair and YANKS BACK, rears u

CLOSE ON ELLA'S DEAD FACE. Still. Beautiful. FIND JAKE, o his knees beside her, hands bound in front of him. An IND WOMAN finishes wrapping the body in a shroud and LEAVES. Jake is alone. Overwhelmed. Raw. Something rising in him. Something he COULDN'T FACE... until this moment:.
I remember now.
I-- I did love her. And just saying it, saying those words, brings a swell of EMOTION to the surface... but he FIGHTS it. A losing batt his eyes WELL:

Floatin', like that arrow thing we found in its eye. Before Jake can makes sense of this, a teepee smoke flap and out steps the tribe's SACHEM. This is GREY WOLF -- da wrinkled face enhanced by TATTOOS. He takes one look at h prisoners and SPEAKS A FEW WORDS OF APACHE.

Now'd be a good time to use your gun bracelet, my friend. But Jake is VACANT. BROKEN. All the fight seems GONE from His bracelet DOESN'T MOVE. Dolarhyde's grabbed first... PULLED FORWARD by one of the braves, raising his TOMAHAWK -- they're really gonna KILL
SURPRISED looks from just about everyone in the camp (bes Colorado) as we realize Dolarhyde just spoke APA ON GREY WOLF -- INTRIGUED as he approaches Dolarhyde:
How is it that you speak our language?
Because I'm a damn genius. Grey Wolf's fascinated this man has the audacity to be a given his circumstances. Turns to the Brave with the toma 73.

I'll have two hundred head of cattle u_a here in a day's time if you let me go. ON GREY WOLF. Considering this.

You can keep my associate here. if I don ' t come back, you can kill him. Colorado REACTS. He's the only one here who knows what th these two are saying to each other as Grey Wolf approache Dolar, looks right INTO HIM --
Why should I believe that you even care about this man? Dolarhyde's eyes flash EMOTION. Quickly bottled. Then:

Three hundred head. Dolar looks to Colorado, who won't meet his eyes. His FAT eyes. Turns back to Grey Wolf, HARD -- 74.

Kill all of them except the half-breed. Our people are GRABBED. Jake's yanked forward, PINNED DOW Brave raises a HATCHET to kill Jake, who glares back with lunatic eyes. Ready to die. Almost wanting it:

text: Except she isn't exactly Ella. She's a HUMANOID, incredib close to us in physical appearance, her features acutely feminine, yet... ALJM. PANDEMONIUM. The Apache kneel in prostration, DROPPING we as flames DISSIPATE off Ella's backlit form. Her skin RET to human flesh-tone. Hair too. . oh. OFF ELLA, who's got a helluva lot to explain --
A deerskin shirt slips down over Ella's naked body.' A da breechcloth is tied. She TURNS to us.: beautiful as ever.

When you were playin' possum. Did you hear what I mid? He's angry. Yes, even embarrassed. And because of it, something has SHUT DOWN in him again. That killer look is
No. I was mendin'.

The one that took you.
It killed her. That LANDS on her. Knowing and painful.

They call him The Slaver. He's the one, gave me the scars. Broke me. And made me watch... while he killed my family too. Even with his guard up... Jake can't help but be STRUCK. sound of HOWLING WIND takes us to:

A SANDSTORM... through which a GHOSTLY FIGURE materialize THE SLAVER. Moving with angry purpose toward the CANYON B As he looks down into it, we hear the SOUNDS of MACHINERY But we DO__QT.YET_ REVEAL what it_ is__ he sees. He stalks down, LEAVING FRAME -- as we HOLD on the field
For every drop of light in the sky, there's another world. Filled with life...

Our race was first to map the stars... that's why they came for us. Took our planet, piece by piece. Slaughtered anyone who fought hack. Ones who survived were turned into slaves. Trackers. They brought me aboard one of their scout ships -- a ship with only one purpose: to find other planets like mine. Planets they can take... people they can enslave. As the terrible gravity of all this HITS everyone, JAKE i to understand...

Been tryin' to make it right... tried to blow the ship to hell by burnin' up all their fuel, then escaped down here.
'Cept it didn't work... damn thing survived.
Where is it. Jake's determined -- he's got his OWN agenda. Ella looks that OMINOUS CLOUD. Those BLUE LIGHT FLASHES ripple withi
Hiding in that cloud. Way I figure, they'll find enough fuel to leave by tomorrow, midday. Then they'll bring back the others. 78.
"others"?
The whole fleet. They'll take what they need. Everyone on this planet. Anything too weak to survive... they'll toss. Like that cow. Tomorrow. Midday. Hi noon. This is bad, bad news.
What'd you mean, they're looking for "fuel"...? And before Ella can answer, Jake already GETS IT:

(NODS, solemn) . wherever it is, that's where you escaped from -- and it's the only way back up to the ship.

That rock you're talkin' about... he- knows where it is.

. Fantastic. You?

That's it. As they near the bluff, they hear the growing sound of th MACHINERY. Everyone dips low, peering over to see... 81. What looks a whole lot like a CAVALRY FORT in the canyon amid a network of trenches and underground tunnels. Holy Jesus. Like a damn fort. Grey Wolf looks to his men, GRAVE, CRESTFALLEN as he real

Transports. Way they get people and gold back and forth to the ship.
Place is crawling with those things. We'll never even get close. Grey Wolf SPEAKS --

He says there's a back way in... The Twin Rivers run underneath this whole canyon. Limestone tunnels up by the falls, couple miles East. Lead right down there. Jake looks to the SKY. DARK. DETERMINED.
The Slaver... he's up in that big cloud? Ella nods, HARD. Off their SHARED DETERMINATION, our SCOR rises. A DRUM CADENCE that suggests a MISSION starting to
DOC. Skeptical, eyes narrow -- staring at Jake and Ella - surrounded by our team and the Apaches back at the APACHE 82.

Just so I got this straight... three of those things just kicked the shit out of your entire gang, took our whole town, and now you two're gonna ride right into that fort, try to hijack one'a those-- He pauses on the word --
"Transports."
-- ride it up to that space boat --
Spaceshp.
Then bring it down here and get everybody off alive? That's your big plan? Jake and Ella share a LOOK. Simply:
Yup.
And just how do you figure on getting in there in the first place?
Poke a hornet's nest... they swarm at'cha.
You gotta draw 'em out. Buy us a distraction. A long beat of incredulous, do-you-believe-this-shit STAR
You want us to storm that fort? Against those things? With less than fifty men? It's suicide.
It ain't, it's been done! I read at school how Ethan Allen and his Green Mountain Boys took Fort Ticonderoga, they weren't but a small garrison and they were outgunned --
We need all of you to make a stand. Together. It's the only way. 83.
Make a stand with what? Jake turns to the WAGON they rode from Jake's gang camp - WHISKEY CRATES. Sweeps up a bottle:
This. An impossible mission. Sure death. Yet for the first time they have an ADVANTAGE. Emmett cuts the moment with a BIG
Hell, yeah. Let's squish some bugs. Grey Wolf CHUCKLES, murmurs. Jake looks to Nat for transl
Somethin' funny?
Yeah... that you whites finally know what it feels like to face extinction. Now that we're on the same side, he says we can all die together.
They're with us. The LOOK holds between them --
Guess that means you're not waitin' for your dad to come back. Colorado's face CLOUDS. Years of ANGER and RESENTMENT:

Been Woodrow Dolarhyde's son my whole life... first time he ever copped to it was to save his own ass. (not without emotion) He's not comin' back. And as Colorado TURNS away, the PERCUSSION finds another

Pieces of CLOTH are RIPPED, stuffed inside the WHISKEY BO MOLOTOV COCKTAILS... Emmett works with Apaches and their KIDS, roping WOOD tog to build LADDERS and CATAPULTS... WAR PAINT is applied to faces in DARK STREAKS... 84. Jake slips on his coat. Sees Emmett lead a horse to mount with his BOW and ARROW QUIVER:
Not you, Kid.
Aw, hell, we been through this. Ya can't stop me. Jake draws his gun, SPINS it in his palm, aims at Emmett'
I can shoot you in the foot.
Bu111i11SHIT. Jake SIGHS -- bluff called. Holsters the gun and takes a knee... but just when we think this is gonna be a tender he GRABS Emmett by the collar, pulls him CLOSE:
You told me your daddy's all you got left. Want me to save his ass? Then park yours right there on the ground, you little shit. Got me? Emmett's nailed. ANGRY, but knows he's gotta stay.
Yeah. I gotcha. Jake releases him. Happy moves to Ella but she TSKS:
Stay with the kid, Happy. The dog WHINES but complies, moving next to Emmett. Jake on his horse. Looks back to the boy -- now he Ia tender:

I'll get your father back. Bastard still owes me fifty dollars. The hint of a SMIRK... long enough for Emmett to SMIRK BA Ella, Doc, and Colorado mount Ap too, along with a 10-MAN WAR PARTY. Jake meets eyes with GREY WOLF:
You'll be ready? Grey Wolf NODS. Some part of the PLAN we have yet to lear And now Jake starts to trot off, Ella beside him. This pl just between the two of them: 85.
That's a nice thing... what you said to the boy. I didn't know better, I'd say you got yourself a sweet side. She smiles. But Jake turns to her -- deadly serious:

There's nothin' sweet about me. I told that kid what he needed to hear so he wouldn't get in my damn way. All I care about is killin' that thing. And Ella reacts to the DARKNESS in his voice. Shakes her
I don't believe that.
Well believe it. I was playing a part. (straight at her) Just like you were. He CRACKS the reins, riding ahead. HOLD ON ELLA... who fi follows as they all ride out and MUSIC SOARS:

Is he okay?

He's gonna be. A storm of mixed emotions in his eyes. That stoic Dolarhy veneer starts to CRACK... just a hint... as the woman MOV him... and TOUCHES his face. And he lets her. WHOA. We realize: this woman is COLORADO MOTHER. Dolarhyde, for all his wicked bluster, LOVES AN A

A CASCADING WATERFALL flows over rock face into the TWIN The water curtain covers a CAVERN ENTRANCE. The back way Jake, Ella, Doc, Colorado and the Apaches cross slippery and push through the water...
Behind the curtain, they shake off the wet and remove TOR from waterproof buffalo-hide pouches. FIRELIGHT as our te creeps along in a column. TENSE. Jake glances at Colorado
You and Percy're brothers, huh?
... half.

We friends now? Last I checked, you shot my ear off.
(a beat; then) Want it back? 87. Colorado GRUMBLES, pushes ahead of Jake...

A BUZZARD picks at the EAR of a DEAD GANG MEMBER. More bi scavenge the dismembered remains of JAKE'S CREW as the re its LIVING MEMBERS -- roughly 30 -- tend wounds and get r move on. One of them looks up... .. and sees an INCOMING RIDER on the horizon:

The hell you want?
It's about what you want. He reaches into his pocket and tosses Bronc a GOLD COIN:
Lonergan stole your gold. That's a taste of what I got -- more'n you've ever seen. It's all yours if you help me get my boy back. The men trade LOOKS. Bronc eyes the coin. Alight with gre
Who's got your boy?
Well, there's the rub.
I got two. Off that --
Our team has travelled far into the bowels of the cavern. STOPS, torchlight reflecting the GOLD in the cavern walls Doc cracks off a piece. POCKETS it. Shrugs: 88.
In case we live through this. They SNEAK on down the narrow shaft til they're funneled

Where our TOWNSPEOPLE were hanging. Now, GONE. Around the corner, the sound of ENGINES POWERING UP... A TRANSPORT. A dozen WORKER-BEE ALIENS try to corral the from the pen -- cruelly jabbing the animals with ALIEN CA PRODS. The mares REAR and WHINNY.

We're never gonna get close to that ship. Silently. a DRIPPING. GLISTENING SHAPE rises un from the behind them. Swaying like a COBRA ready to strike: Our people TURN... the TUBE ALIEN snatches one of the Apa SWALLOWING HIM in its thorny snout! The indian SCREAMS --
Lights a WHISKEY MOLOTOV, hurls it at the CREATURE: BOOM! KEENS, BURNING, SPITTING OUT the Apache. ALERTED, the doz aliens by the transport SWARM at our heroes!
C g_that shuttle. Colorado readies his TOMAHAWK -- Jake meets his eyes:
Knew there was a good reason I didn't kill you.

Just thinkin' the same thing. The men trade FATEFUL LOOKS... then the Indians HURL MOLO the charging horde: KAAA-BOOM! Aliens TWIST and SCREAM -- The Apaches STRIKE FEARLESSLY -- but the aliens quickly R and SHAKE THEM OFF, tearing most of them to SHREDS. The horses BREAK FREE and crash madly through the cavern And this is the DISTRACTION Jake and Ella need to make th for the transport -- up the loading ramp:
Ella SLAMS a switch and the ramp DRAWS UP. Jake FREEZES: COCOONS hang all around, filled with motionless HUMAN BEI 89.
Jake - - (he can only stare) JAKE. She slaps open an ENGINEERING HATCH, drops down a LADDER. takes a last awful look and SLIDES down after her --
-- the ladder funnels into the COCKPIT. Ella starts TAPPI console and HOLO-DISPLAYS appear, Alien text, rotating graphics. She slides into a SEAT --
Strap in. dammit!!!
Into what?!? Ella JAMS a lever forward and the shuttle RISES. JAKE gra WEBBING that must be some type of SEATBELT, feeling the sensation of ELLQU as:
Ella pilots the ship UPWARD, thrusters belching a WAKE OF that SCORCHES cavern walls and INCINERATES 6 ALIENS! As a HORSE streaks by, Colorado grabs a hunk of mane, LEA
DOC comes RUNNING frantically:

Colorado PULLS Doc up onto the horse's bare back -- no ea with Doc's 300 POUNDS. The remaining Apaches (5) commande horses and GALLOP HARD down the tunnel -- Two aliens jump on MANTA-SPEEDERS in pursuit!

Hold on. 90. She cranks back and the ship PITCHES upward --

The shuttle BURSTS OUT into the canyon and skates the rim fights the G-FORCES and teeth-rattling TURBULENCE as -- The craft keeps spiralling UP UP toward... THE OMINOUS CL As we come closer, an IMPOSSIBLY BLUE GLOW blinds us:
The shuttle BLASTS through the upper cloud layer, to reve
-SHIP. ENORMOUS AND THREATENING, like a BLACK METAL CLAW. of a hurricane. ON ELLA. Like ice down her spine... as we drift back to J Trying to find a word to DESCRIBE this thing. Finally:
Sheee-it.

The rest of our heroes GALLOP FAST out the criss-crossing tunnels -- KA-CHINNNG! Apaches are CLAMPED WITH STEEL COL and YANKED off their horses as the SPEEDERS roar in from Colorado VEERS toward a LIGHT as Doc ignites a molotov an

STEEL ENTRY GATES... which sta SWINGING CLOSED to trap them! But at the LAST SECOND, the horse SLIPS THROUGH the narro opening as it THUNDERS CLOSED. Now the aliens are pissed
They start spilling over the fort walls in pursuit. A few SPEEDERS and launch as our guys ride DOWN THE CANYON TREN
Colorado and Doc ZIG-ZAG around CURVES -- like mice navig maze, so the speeders can't get a clear shot:
They're gaining on us! 91.

That's the point! And just when it looks like Doc and Colorado are GONERS.. BOOM! An EXPLOSION rocks the canyon as something HURTLES from above -- WHISKEY MOLOTOVS fired from the handmade CATAPULTS. BOOM! BOOM! Aliens are VAPORIZED, SHRIEKING! A cloudburst of FLAMING ARROWS brightens the sky as 20 AP RISE UP along the canyon rims: A AMBUSH! An ASSEMBLY LINE OF SQUAWS works like a drill team, soaki WHISKEY RAGS and wrapping arrows. Among them, EMMETT and The kid pocks an arrow like a damn EXPERT -- IGNITES it - it FLY -- WHOOSH! CRASH! The Apaches HURTLE into the flank of aliens. LASER met with the CRACK of RIFLES and hatchets --
The Apache leader spurs his horse onward, leading men tow alien bunker. An EXPLOSION CONSUMES FRAME, becoming the:
-- PLASMA FIRE of the shuttle's burners as it ROARS towar ALIEN SHIP... a SPECK against the BEHEMOTH:

The shuttle sweeps past the command center's polarized wi where... THE SLAVER watches with EVIL EYES. He's on the UPPER LEVEL of a TWO-TIER COMMAND CENTER. A D ALIENS operate holo-consoles. Readying the ship to leave.
Ella settles down on a GLOWING DOCKING COLLAR. With the t ships CONNECTED, the DISPLAY flashes a DEPARTURE ALERT: 92.
-- Dammit --- -- what--?
-- she's CLIMBING back up the ladder, he FOLLOWS:
They quickly CLIMB up the LADDER TUBE --
Engines are warming up -- got eight minutes til the ship leaves, and about one til automated retrieval --
-- autojamated what --?
As they spill into the LOADING BAY, a CLANG reverberates: THE AIRLOCK DOOR -- AT THEIRFEyT The first EXPLOSIVE BOLT shoots off. Ella jams her SHOTGU a sheath on her back, presses herself flat:
Hug the wall. Jake does that beside her as the next bolt PINGS out --
When they come at us, aim for their heads. Only way to kill 'em for sure. He looks at his bracelet, adrenaline SURGING -- it ACTIVA
I'll aim just fine. THE LAST BOLT FIRES and the airlock door SHOOTS OFF:

LIMBS SWINGING AROUND INCHES FROM THEIR FACES

And JUMPS after her --
-- LANDING beside Ella. Starts to pick himself up... but he sees ASSAULTS HIS MIND. We RISE UP UP UP, Ella and Jak growing SMALLER in what we now reveal is a MASSIVE HANGAR

head_text.subj: AUTOMATED -ARMS PLANT RECENT ARRIVALS INTO A VERITABLE FO

text: PEOPLE AND ANIMALS. Level after level, THOUSANDS UPON THO OF COCOONS are suspended from branch-like limbs. Jake picks himself up, looking around the massive hangar
-- she PULLS HIM into an alcove as a machine arm SWINGS overhead, flashing a WIDE CONICAL LASER that inventories like the machine in the underground cave. As they CROUCH:
We can't let that thing see us or they'll know we're here. She turns -- hits buttons on a console -- a door SLIDES U leading to a series of CORRIDORS. She starts to MOVE --
This'll take us to the bridge -- But Jake doesn't follow. STARES at her --
Slaver's up there--?
I sure as hell hope not.
Then I'm not goin' with you. And now she HARDENS --

You got any idea how big this ship is? No ray you'll ever find him alone. Be like findin' a needle in a-- -- SLAM!! Jake interrupts her by aiming at the LASER SCAN and FIRING HIS BLASTER, blowing it apart. The scanner eye CRASHES to the floor, flaming. A KLAXON rings -- 94.
I ain't gonna find him. He's gonna find me.
Thanks for the head start. She turns and RUNS. Jake moves to that scanner eye on the floor, walks right up to it and STARES into the shattered
Alright, you sonofabitch... come and get me.

JAKE'S FACE APPEARS AS A THERMAL HEAT SOURCE -- fritzing stares into the scanner. ALARMS scream. THE SLAVER fills with RAGE. And RECOGNITION. Aliens begin grabbing WEAPONS but The Slaver SHRIEKS for STOP. We don't need to speak alien to understand: "He's mine. "

Jake has moved out into the corridors -- blaster ready -- darting -- suddenly -- WHAM: A STEEL BARRICADE SLAMS DOWN BEHIND HIM. WHAM! Another in front -- WHAM! He's TRAPPED, shut off from the passageway .. except ONE. A long, dark tunnel. A DOOR at the far end HISSES open: THE TURBOLIFT ELEVATOR. ON JAKE. Understanding... his call is bging answe
Okay. And starts walking to the elevator... as a SCREAM takes u
Handmade LADDERS are SWUNG FORWARD onto the fort as Apach to SCALE the wall, but are BLOWN BACK by ALIEN PARAPET SE ON DOC -- running TRIAGE on wounded warriors: 95.
I need more bandages now!/ You: lint and splint that leg!

We're losing ranks ! ! ! And then, out of nowhere... the BANG BANG BANG of 30 pist fills the air as -- DOLARHYDE RIDES IN WITH JAKE'S GANG! A renewed SURGE of e as cowboys join Indians to fortify their ranks:
You came back!

Told you: I take care of my kin. Colorado knows that's as close to "I love you" as he'll e get. But the UPSWING is short-lived as: A speeder WHIZZES past, dropping a METALLIC BUNDLE. It sp open right in front of the fort's STEEL GATES -- pieces hydraulically ASSEMBLING THEMSELVES in seconds, becoming: THE MOTHERFUCKING SUPERGUN_OF DEATH. TWO LETHAL BARRELS s life, firing STRANGE STEEL BALL BEARINGS in every directi CLAW HOOKS snap out of the balls, EMBEDDING in soldiers! LODGES in a GANG MEMBER beside DOC -- he FLAILS:
A RED SPRING-LOADED PIN depresses in the ball's center: K

head_text.subj: SEARING WHITE LIGHT TURNS THE OFFICER TOAASH

text: GRENADE! Doc goes FLYING from the kickback, landing near: GREY WOLF -- FWWWWTWHCK!!! Another claw-ball CLAMPS into Apache's SHOULDER -- he SHOUTS, struggles to pull it out

The RED PIN starts to depress -- pOC LUNGES, JAMS HIS FIN RETJff&H_THE PIN AND BLASTING CAP. Now he's stopped it fr exploding, but if he pulls his finger out... HE DIES TOO. DOC and GREY WOLF lock eyes. Their fates suddenly ENTWINE

Bars of light move rhythmically across Jake's face -- BUR with determination -- as he travels up in the turbolift. slows to a STOP. The door cycles open and -- 96. -- the STRANGEST THING happens. DESERT SAND billows in a of ventilated air. SAND?! Jake emerges, blocking his eyes

-- the sand swirls and eddies. Visibility reduced to ZERO Jake pushes through, the air clears a little... His eyes WIDEN. Trying to make SENSE of what he sees: Remember all those BUILDINGS that were pulled up into the tornado when Absolution was attacked? And that CRATER the found that used to be "Winfield's Landing"? It-'-s all-HE in a junkwle hangar. Building pieces. False front facades. Debris piled on top of each other, TILTED AND TW AT FUNHOUSE ANGLES. And the desert sand that was sucked u along with it all. A GLOWING REACTOR casts hellish light on the dormant wrec Weapon ready, Jake moves past part of A BROTHEL. Jutting fragments of a HORSE CORRAL. A CREAKING SALOON SIGN swing a pendulum, CLANKS EERILY. A STEAM PIPE EXPLODES STEAM. Jake WHIRLS -- and like demo 5 ALIENS emerge. Slowly. Fanning out, taking positions as THE SLAVER steps out of the smoke, squarely facing Jake. is holding ELLA hostage. WRIST BLASTER pressed to her thr Jake and Ella LOCK EYES. She's terrified, but staying STR His hand LINGERS at his hip, blaster ready.
Drop the woman. We both know this ain't about her. But The Slaver only presses his blaster HARDER into Ella' Almost GRINNING. And Jake MEETS the look --
She says you're as bad as they come. Jake curls back the fingers on both hands, CRACKING knuck
Well, you ugly sonofabitch... they say the same about me. A pipe SPEWS STEAM -- UNNERVINGLY LOUD. Then STOPS.

Could'a had your boys kill me five times over, instead you rolled out the red carpet... so let's get it over with. 97. The Slaver HISSES ANGRILY at the challenge. PUSHES Ella r off to one of his GANG, who keeps a blaster pressed to he Vow ' O right the a ter of the "town" junkpile. THE SLAVER -- his hand at his side, twitching. JAKE -- his hand is still.

head_text.subj: A PIPE SPRAYS STEAM AGAIN, SCREAMINGLY LOUD AND --

text: Everyone DRAWS! But Jake's INSANELY FAST as he drops to a and FIRES gunsmoke-style -- BLAM SLAM! The Slaver's HIT a ELLA -- WRENCHES her captor's arm backward and he fires U ROUNDS into the air -- she takes a HIT in the leg as Jake the captor with a SHOT to the temple -- Jake GRABS and PULLS Ella to safety behind a SHREDDED STO FRONT, taking cover -- lasers PUNCHING through the buildi walls -- Ella spots an ALIEN lunging around a corner:
Jake WHIRLS, SLAM!!! The creature FLIES off its feet.

Stay down. Ella does, and here come the rest of the aliens as Jake G THEM ALL DOWN WITH PERFECT AIM. The REACTOR is hit in the crossfire and the ship RESPONDS turbine HOWL. Corpses litter the floor... all except for The Slaver. A of FLUORESCENT BLOOD leads around the corner... Jake WHIRLS to Ella -- her leg wounded --
-- you alright? In PAIN, she snatches one of those SMART DISCS off a dead

Reactor's hit. if I don't get this ship on the ground soon, we're all dead... (tries to STAND, WINCES) Get me over to that turbolift. He slings an arm around her shoulder and LIFTS her, helpi to the elevator -- 98.
Put me inside. He does. She sees his eyes go back to The Slaver's BLOOD
I can manage the rest without you. (tough... but with
Go do what you came up here to do. He looks at her. At the blood. At the unstable REACTOR. And Jake Lonergan makes a CHOICE:
Goddamnit. -- he gets INTO THE ELEVATOR with her. She SLAMS the cont pad, doors CLOSE -- they start rocketing upward. She half as her eyes hold on him. And within them... trust. AND FA
Stop smiling.
As the FORT SIEGE continues, DOLARHYDE and COLORADO gallo and forth between their men:
-- KATHWAM! An EXPLOSION throws them off their horses. Colorado picks up his father and they start RUNNING LOW u stray beams of PLASMA FIRE, reaching Doc and Grey Wolf:
Doc's finger is still STUCK in that ALIEN GRENADE, clampe the bleeding Apache's shoulder:
The hell iz that? Grey Wolf MOANS in pain. Doc SHOUTS to Dolar:
Tell him to hold still! If I have this thing figured right, long as t keep my finger under the red pin we won't blow up!
What's he saying?: 99.
He says we're all gonna die.
We need to pull it out of his shoulder!
I'm not pullin' anything!
He's the damn doctor! ZZZZZZAM! MORE people are CUT DOWN by the Alien GRENADE C -- the BLOWBACK nearly KNOCKS the grenade out of Doe's ha
Dolarhyde gets an IDEA. HARDENS. Looks Doc right in the e

Alright, listen -- you slide your finger from under that pin, I'll slip mine in and hold it in place. Then you pull it out and I'll throw it. Doc NODS fearfully. Dolar carefully SLIPS his finger unde pin as Doc SLIPS it out. PHEW. Now Doc takes hold of the grenade itself, nods "ready" to pull it out. Grey Wolf br
On three...
One... t --
-- Wait. Everyone LURCHES from the tension interrupt:
Tell your wife we're clear.
What?
-- your wife. Maria. We had an arrangement. I left your saloon alone and she paid me off. ON DOC. Reeling, now REALLY confused --
We're broke. Paid you off with what? 100.
She stole from the people in your morgue. Gold teeth, trinkets, pocket watches -- It LANDS on Doc: that's why he fond the watch under their
I thought she was cheating!
Just robbin' corpses.
Thank God! (and then -- ) Wait. You hate me. Why're you telling me this? With GENUINE REMORSE:
May not get another chance --
-- and I still hate ya. A MOMENT. Forgiveness and atonement.

head_text.subj: WILL YOU GET ON WITH IT

text: One... two... three! And Doc RIPS the grenade from Grey Wolf's shoulder -- he CLAMPS tearing out of his flesh. But they did it! As more EXPLOSIONS decimate men, Dolarhyde PULLS the gren of Doc's hands, still holding his finger under the FIRING
Dolarhyde looks at Colorado:
Tell your mother I love her. With that, he CHARGES into the swirling chaos
-- but BOOM! Colorado's FORCED BACK by an explosion -- th the debris, he sees his father running toward...
Dolarhyde HURLS the grenade -- BOOM!!! IT DETONATES IN A
But his sacrifice 7M S THE TIDE! THE EXPLOSION BLOWS THE
A CRY OF VICTORY as the humans STORM THROUGH! Aliens hurt back in DISORDER --

The small ALIEN BRIDGE CREW scrambles to control the dama ship. The WHIR of the lift arriving, doors OPEN and -- WHOOSH! The SMART WEAPON blurs out of the elevator, SLICI HALF A DOZEN ALIENS IN HALF -- circles back around to ELL skillfully catches it as she RUN/LIMPS from the lift with LASER FIRE IGNITES THE BRIDGE as he makes QUICK WORK of t and Ella mans a console, getting to work --

We're going down fast. She calls up telemetry on a HOLO-WINDOW: EARTH TERRAIN -- BATTLEFIELD. Sets coordinates, vectoring the ship that wa A WHIR as a SECOND TURBOLIFT arrives... AND THE SLAVER ST QQT. Wounded, and very PISSED OFF. Jake says to Ella:

No matter what. Jake and The Slaver HURTLE into each other, TUMBLE off a catwalk, CRASHING into conduits and GUNKY WATER below. Jake staggers up but The Slaver is HUGE -- SLAMS Jake bac the water. PINS A FOOT on his blaster arm -- CRUSHING IT. Jake HOWLS as The Slaver presses a series of those HIEROG MARKINGS on Jake's BRACELET -- the symbols LIGHT UP in an CODE -- and KA-CHING! The bracelet POPS OF.E. The Slaver TOSSES IT into the gunky water. Draws his LASE -- WHUP-SNAP! The white-hot tip LASHES JAKE'S BACK, rippi shirt and BURN-SCARRING HIS BACK! Jake SCREAMS in agony as The Slaver WHIPS HIM MERCILESSLY
The Scout Ship SCREAMS down out of the cloud, toward the 102.

Outlaws and Apaches finish off the wounded, TOMAHAWKS RIP AWAY TENTACLED SCALPS! Carnage and joy -- but then: A MONSTROUS SHADOW spreads over the battlefield. Everyone up to see the SCOUT SHIP PLUMMETING DOWN --
Fall back!!! NOW!! NOW!!

Another LASER WHIP SNAP and Jake seems DONE. Now The Slav LIFTS Jake from the water, CRUSHING his wind-pipe. Jake FLAILS, REACHING for something BELOW FRAME... finall and STABS it into The Slaver's side. The Alien ROARS in p and looks down to see --

SIDE. IT STARTS TO GLOW BLUE WITH A HIGH-PITCH WHINE

text: Go to hell.

FREEZES TO GREY STONE. EXPLODING IN A MILLION PIECES

text: Jake DROPS, GASPING. Revenge fulfilled. Painfully starts CLIMBING a ladder back to the upper deck --
As the humans FLEE from the fort, the remaining aliens RE to the last shuttles for ESCAPE... start to LIFT OFF... But find themselves SMASHING into the ENORMOUS HULL of th as_it crashe _down!
Jake FALLS into the seat beside Ella, straps in. Fighting controls, she SEES THE WHIP MARKS on his back. It TEARS h heart open. And because this might be the end... she ADMI
I lied.
... I know.
No, I heard what you said when I was layin' there... 103. JAKE. Taken aback. LAID BARE. As she says:
You are a good man. At least... to me. The ground GROWS BIGGER out the window. Her HAND reaches for his. JAKE'S HAND clasps hers and --
