FORT, RIPPING IT INTO TIDAL-WAVE MOUNDS OF SHRAPNEL... CH
A HALF-MILE BEFORE SLOWLY COMING TO A FINAL, WRENCHING...

text: The frame is WHITE with dust and SUNSHINE. As from the et comes... EMMETT, HAPPY, and DOC, with GREY WOLF's arm slung over h shoulder. Among other faces, White and Apache... all of t PROUD WARRIORS. Staring in awe at: THE CRASHED ALIEN SHIP. DUG DEEP INTO THE CANYON FLOOR. Something starts to rain down. Looks at first like glitte until we realize it's GOLD DUST. From an OPENING in the Scout Ship, the sound of THUNDERIN HOOVES as... ALL THE ANIMALS STAMPEDE OUT. Then, slowly.. HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE emerge, dazed -- their minds slowly WA UP. White and Kiowa-Apache ABDUCTEES. DOC RUSHES IN, searching faces -- no -- no -- no -- n-- THERE she is, his BELOVED MARIA, stumbling weakly toward tears runs down her cheek. He EMBRACES her madly, kissing inch of her face as... EMMETT pushes through the crowd, sees SHERIFF TAGGART --
The kid GRABS his father and holds him for dear life, as stares back in a daze --
It's me -- it's Emmett. And somewhere in there, RECOGNITION comes to the Sheriff' eyes... Emmett SMILES and throws his arms around his fath again as --

head_text.subj: THE TOWNSFOLK OF ABSOLUTION AND THE APACHES FIND EACH OTH

text: Families, lovers, friends... reunited. 104.
Moving through the FALLEN BODIES toward the lifeless form Dolarhyde, his FATHER. Eyes welling, he drops to his knee
Nat? Colorado turns -- it's PERCY. Confused. Like waking from dream. Sees his father on the ground...
What... happened? And all Colorado can say is...
He's dead. That HANGS there. Percy blinks. And then --
Who's gettin' the ranch? ON COLORADO. At first, words that don't compute. Then PUR BLIND RAGE takes hold and his FISTS FLY, PUNCHING PERCY:
Colorado WHIRLS -- DOLARHYDE IS STAGGERING TO HIS FEET, A
No one's gettin' my ranch. Stunned, Colorado GRINS. Percy spits blood, points accusi
Paw, he-- Dolarhyde SMACKS Percy across the face:
OW!!! What'd you do that for?

For being an ungrateful little bastard. Now shake your brother's hand and thank him for saving your ass, cause it's more than you ever would'a done bjM. 105. Chastened, Percy glowers at Colorado. Grudgingly reaches hand. So does Nat. As they SHAKE --
That's better.
Staggers through the crowd. And sees ELLA. Thgy did it. B she still looks TROUBLED. Staring out at the vast desert.
. what is it?

We didn't get all of 'em. Some ran oft. That LANDS on Jake, as he too looks toward the endless ho HOLD on them, together, a VICTORIOUS but UNRESOLVED note. We RISE UP over the sea of bodies and the CRASHED SHIP, u Jake and Ella are just two small figures in the crowd...

A glorious sight: Absolution in REBIRTH -- FLUSH from all GOLD. Storefronts brightly painted, the streets ALIVE. We PICK UP EMMETT running through the hustle and bustle w APACHE KIDS. Suddenly, DOLARHYDE, COLORADO and their gang in. SHERIFF TAGGART emerges from his office with DEPUTY W
-- what? What'd I dQ?

Get outta the road before you're run down! If your (overlapping) momma saw y-- -- "saw me playin' in the street she'd roll over in her grave and shoot lightnin' bolts outta her eyes," I know, I know! He runs off. Taggart SMIRKS:
Kid's got a mouth on him. 106.
Well, Kyle, considering he saved your life, guess you'll just have to grin'n bear it. Dolar moves up to Taggart, tough as ever. The men HOLD lo
Woodrow.
Kyle. Percy STEWS about something. Dolar WHACKS him upside the
Go_ _on. Grudgingly, Percy hands Taggart a SHEAF OF PAPER --
What's this?

Claims to the land 50 miles west of here. I've signed it over to the township of Absolution. (off Taggart's LOOK) Considering I'm a businessman, I figure expansion's in both our interests. Needs the Sheriff's signature to be official.
Fifty miles west of here is where the goldmine is, Woodrow.
That so. With surprise, Taggart studies the paper. SMILES:
What's this about twenty percent going to the Apaches? Dolarhyde glances at Colorado. A moment. But the hardened rancher maintains his rock-solid facade:
Figure the only way not to piss 'em off is to buy 'em.
Since when'd you worry about pissin' anyone off? 107.
Just sign it, Goddamnit. With a grin, Taggart gestures for Deputy Wade to turn aro flattens the paper on his BACK, using it as a surface to
I'd say you were being generous, Woodrow, but I know you'd just be insulted.
Damn right. Dolar gives his hat a TIP, then mounts up to go -- and we UP to the UPPER FLOOR of the GOLD LEAF SALOON, in the pro being rebuilt in grand style -- and MOVE IN on a WINDOW w
DOC AND MARIA burst through a door, tearing passionately other's CLOTHES -- Maria MOANS as Doc kisses her neck:
SHH! The workers will hear us!!! Let them hear! As they TUMBLE back onto the bed, Doc LURCHES. Reaches un his back to find... a GOLD POCKETWATCH.
What is this?
Look at the inscription. He flips it open to find an ENGRAVING: "MI CORAZON... POR SIEMPRE." Doc looks up at her, MOVED. Then -- PLAYFULLY:
This looks like Aldo Mayberry's watch...
Shut up and kiss me. She pulls him down, OUT OF FRAME --
A hand unties a HORSE from its tether bar -- it's JAKE. S bags packed. A BARK turns him around... HAPPY. Yipping fo Jake to FOLLOW. He GRINS. As MUSIC begins to RISE -- HOPE
In a LONG SHOT -- the distant SILHOUETTES of Happy BOUNDI through the shallow TWIN RIVERS, Jake following on horseb 108.

As Jake approaches, APACHE SENTRIES emerge from rocks to outsiders away. Jake TIPS his hat and they nod, let him p He nears the bluff where ELLA, GREY WOLF, and the rest of Apaches finish laying DYNAMITE DET CORD that trails down the canyon. Ella hears Happy BARKING -- turns to see her with Jake. She smiles as he rides up, dismounts:
Second damn time that dog ran off on me.

Second time he brought me to you. Happy's tail wags. The look between Jake and Ella HOLDS. it seems freighted with everything. Finally, he breaks it glancing at the Apaches finishing their work with the dyn and the remnants of the ALIEN SHIP and FORTRESS below.
Looks like you got everything set. Ella eyes Jake's horse, loaded with GEAR. Looks up, clear
Where you headed?
Got some messes to clean up. But she looks at him. fEADI.NG liim. wryly:
Messes.
... Yep. (then; off her look) What. She walks right up to his horse. Right up to HIM:
I think you're ridin' off cause you're just scared of what'll happen if you stay. An INFERENCE here. Ella's going BOLD. Jake swings off his horse, lands beside her. Now. Almost CURIOUS:
And what's gonna happen? 109. She steps CLOSER to him... INTIMATE:
You know. A CHARGE between them. All they wanna do is KISS... But that'd be too easy. And those wounds of his, they hav quite healed. He drops his eyes; SOFTLY NOW:
If I stay... it's not gonna be good for anybody, Ella. A beat. She looks off. Nods. They say nothing. And now he slowly climbs back on his horse. Ella TOUGHENS:
Heard some rumors outta Abilene. Weird noises at night. Cattle mutilations. Weather phenomena. Figured I'd ride down there. Give it a look-see.
(his eyes narrow) What's 'phenomena'?
Big storms in places that don't get big storms. ON JAKE. Every fighting instinct in him suddenly IGNITED, though he plays it down:
You goin' down there yourself?
Why? You worried about me? You bet your ass he is. But, he shakes his head--
No, ma'am. You can take care of yourself just fine. (then; tips his hat) Be seein' you around.
goodbye, Jake. He gets back on his horse. Starts to ride off. Happy BARK trots alongside him. BARK BARK BARK. In dog that means "D be an idiot." Jake glances over -- 110.
Get the hell away from me, you damn mutt. (BARK, BARK)

Go on, GET. He heels his horse, leaving Happy behind to WHINE. Jake rides off into the sunset. But his heart's KICKING i chest. And this is pretty much where things usually end.. But. Jake pulls the REINS as he SIGHS. Turns the horse ar TROTS back to Ella, whose smile WIDENS as he closes the g between them. Finally STOPS right in front of her. And despite his best effort to stay TOUGH... he just plain likes her:

Abilene happens to be on my way. He reaches out a hand... she takes it... as he PULLS HER THE SADDLE. Ella grinning ear-to-ear as she folds her arm around his waist. Jake -- ever the outlaw -- grumbles:

Stop smiling, Goddammit. He KICKS the horse and Happy follows. Ella shoots a goodb look to Grey Wolf, who NODS. Signals his men and FUSES AR The DYNAMITE FUSES ssssssnake down the mountain -- reachi canyon floor -- INTO those limestone tunnels where CLUSTE DYNAMITE have been placed... and as FUSE MEETS EXPLOSIVE:

head_text.subj: JAKE AND ELLA CRESTING A HILL

text: THUNDER of EXPLOSIONS makes them rear. They turn back to

head_text.subj: THE TWIN RIVERS GEYSERING UP INTO THE CANYON. COVERING AL
EVIDENCE OF THE ALIEN SHIP AND 'Q T.

text: Ella folds her arms TIGHTER around Jake, her heart full. nod of private affirmation, he spurs the horse with a HYA As the canyon behind them fills with rushing water, Jake Ella ride hard into the fiery sunset... Away from the past, toward a future full of promise. FADE OUT.
